text: Cozy place that you can chill and just hang out with your friends. Can enjoy board games with friends as well, Benny is very friendly and approachable! He did a great job explaining the games
Very welcoming and jovial environment! A bit hard to find the place but with the variety of board games it is worth going there.
This place is really cool! Nice clean fun space to play games, and they'll tech you with so much positive energy!
Benny is very helpful and knowledgeable with all the games! We had a great day and highly recommended.
